attributes.action: Give the electerate the right of a referendum on the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the Electerate of the United Kingdom demand that a referendum on the European Union be instigated immeadiately and the decision written into UK law to stop future govenments continuing to sign away the rights of the United Kingdom citizens without authorisation and to honour the Act of Assention made by the Monarch which states that no government may give control of the United Kingdom to a foreign power. World War 2 was fought by this country to retain it's independence. No government has the authority to ignore the sacricfice made by it's people in that conflict.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
